code: @Override public String toString() {     StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder().     builder.append(type.getCanonicalName()).     if (typeArgs != null) {         builder.append("<").append(typeArgs).append(">").     }     builder.append(" ").append(name).     return builder.toString(). }
public static ApiMethodArg arg(String name, Class<?> type) {     return new ApiMethodArg(name, type, null). }
public static ApiMethodArg arg(String name, Class<?> type, String typeArgs) {     return new ApiMethodArg(name, type, typeArgs). }
